Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Arenicin-3 analog N8 (Synthetic AMPs, linear, UCLL1)
Sequence Information.Source: amino acid substitution, animal-derived, natural derivative

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (66.67%) toArenicin-3V=A=R: 19%, N: 14%, G: 10%.Activity: active against Gram- bacteria E. coli CVCC195 or CVCC1515 or CICC21530 serotype O157:H7 (MIC 16-32 ug/ml), S-typhimurium ATCC14028 (MIC >64 ug/ml), S. enteritidis CVCC3377 (MIC 1 ug/ml), S. pullorum CVCC1789 or CVCC1802 (MIC 32->128 ug/ml), S-choleraesuis CVCC503 (MIC >64 ug/ml), P.aeruginosa CICC10419 or CICC21630 (MIC >128 ug/ml), Gram+ S. aureus ATCC43300 MRSA or ATCC25923 (MIC 2->64 ug/ml), S.suis CVCC606 (MIC >128 ug/ml), E. faecium CMCC1.2136 (MIC 16 ug/ml), and B. subtilis ATCC6633 (MIC 4 ug/ml).
Literature Information.Author: Yang N, Liu X, Teng D, Li Z, Wang X, Mao R, Wang X, Hao Y, Wang J. 2017
Literature Information.Title: Antibacterial and detoxifying activity of NZ17074 analogues with multi-layers of selective antimicrobial actions against Escherichia coli and Salmonella enteritidis.
